name: Step -> Save Combos
author: Aslion
info: Simple script that saves the game when you step on a certain combo and plays a sound effect.
description: Simple script that saves the game when you step on a certain combo and plays a sound effect. Only triggers once per screen (re-entry allows saving again).Could not find anything like this on the site/database so I figured I'd submit it in case anybody has a use for it.
setup:
Only requires std.zh

D1 - Sound effect to play when triggered.
D2 - Combo number to use for the save point.
